hooks.prompt: Before ending this session, perform a learning balance check: Review the session to assess consumption (reading files, web fetches) versus digestion activities (creating maps, practice exercises, classifications). If significant content was consumed without corresponding encoding/digestion activities, remind the user: 'You consumed content this session. Consider using /balance-check to assess your consumption:digestion ratio, or use /grinde, /digest, or /pacer commands to encode what you've learned before it fades.'
